item.title: Mechanical CAD Software
item.description: What is CAD software used for? Computer Aided Drafting (CAD) software is used to capture and simulate designs electronically.

item.title: Sources for Mechanical Components
item.description: General Berg Grainger (* ASU Preferred Supplier) McMaster-Carr Miki Pulley MSC Industrial (* ASU Preferred Supplier) Motor System Parts from Radical RC Stock Drive Products Bearings igus - plastic bushings, bearings, linear guides, and cable carriers.
